00037 int FirstDerivativeFirstOrder(
00038                                 double  *Df,  
00039                                 double  *f,   
00041                                 int     dir,  
00042                                 int     bias, 
00044                                 void    *s,   
00045                                 void    *m    
00046                              )
00047 {
00048   SolverContext *solver = (SolverContext*) s;
00049   int           i, j, v;
00050 
00051   int ghosts = solver->ghosts;
00052   int ndims  = solver->ndims;
00053   int nvars  = solver->nvars;
00054   int *dim   = solver->dim_local;
00055 
00056 
00057   if ((!Df) || (!f)) {
00058     fprintf(stderr, "Error in FirstDerivativeSecondOrder(): input arrays not allocated.\n");
00059     return(1);
00060   }
00061 
00062   /* create index and bounds for the outer loop, i.e., to loop over all 1D lines along
00063      dimension "dir"                                                                    */
00064   int indexC[ndims], index_outer[ndims], bounds_outer[ndims];
00065   _ArrayCopy1D_(dim,bounds_outer,ndims); bounds_outer[dir] =  1;
00066   int N_outer; _ArrayProduct1D_(bounds_outer,ndims,N_outer);
00067 
00068 #pragma omp parallel for schedule(auto) default(shared) private(i,j,v,index_outer,indexC)
00069   for (j=0; j<N_outer; j++) {
00070     _ArrayIndexnD_(ndims,j,bounds_outer,index_outer,0);
00071     _ArrayCopy1D_(index_outer,indexC,ndims);
00072     /* left boundary */
00073     for (i = -ghosts; i < -ghosts+1; i++) {
00074       int qC, qR;
00075       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00076       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qR );
00077       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  Df[qC*nvars+v] = f[qR*nvars+v]-f[qC*nvars+v];
00078     }
00079     /* interior */
00080     for (i = -ghosts+1; i < dim[dir]+ghosts-1; i++) {
00081       int qC, qL, qR;
00082       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00083       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qL);
00084       indexC[dir] = i+1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qR);
00085       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  Df[qC*nvars+v] = max(bias,0)*f[qR*nvars+v]-bias*f[qC*nvars+v]+min(bias,0)*f[qL*nvars+v];
00086     }
00087     /* right boundary */
00088     for (i = dim[dir]+ghosts-1; i < dim[dir]+ghosts; i++) {
00089       int qL, qC;
00090       indexC[dir] = i-1; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qL );
00091       indexC[dir] = i  ; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,indexC,ghosts,qC );
00092       for (v=0; v<nvars; v++)  Df[qC*nvars+v] = f[qC*nvars+v]-f[qL*nvars+v];
00093     }
00094   }
00095   
00096   return(0);
00097 }
